note.title: ***Template Description***
note.para: This template forms the basis for the simplest of procedures. It consists of a sequence of steps which result in a separate (new) dialog. The dialog is displayed following the relevant step.

note.para: The procedure id (and the resultant file name for the procedure) is the same as the title of the main dialog where possible. Otherwise choose a logical name describing the task or procedure.
* The proc-HIB-Template_One.xml filename will be changed to proc-HIB-ProcedureName.xml"
